name: Word By Word
text: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|137|713$لَكَ|for you|67|146|323$لَأَجْرًا|surely (is) a reward|149|228|6678$غَيْرَ مَمْنُونٍ|endless.|135|174|17152$

name: Word By Word
text: فَسَتُبْصِرُ|So soon you will see|155|352|17154$وَيُبْصِرُونَ|and they will see,|137|334|17155$

name: Word By Word
text: بِأَييِّكُمُ|Which of you|107|315|17156$ٱلْمَفْتُونُ|(is) the afflicted one.|162|370|17157$

name: Word By Word
text: أَن|Because|75|120|655$كَانَ|(he) is|63|152|913$ذَا مَالٍ|a possessor of wealth|165|254|17166$وَبَنِينَ|and children,|105|150|10232$

name: Word By Word
text: إِذَا|When|57|82|1370$تُتْلَىٰ|are recited|92|141|3123$عَلَيْهِ|to him|64|113|395$ءَايَـٰتُنَا|Our Verses,|97|146|7237$قَالَ|he says,|76|125|309$أَسَـٰطِيرُ|`Stories|94|118|5506$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|(of) the former (people).`|192|192|5507$

name: Word By Word
text: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|107|120$بَلَوْنَـٰهُمْ|have tried them|125|147|17169$كَمَا|as|53|75|110$بَلَوْنَآ|We tried|76|98|17170$أَصْحَـٰبَ|(the) companions|136|158|4057$ٱلْجَنَّةِ|(of) the garden,|127|138|778$إِذْ|when|55|100|1198$أَقْسَمُواْ|they swore|94|184|5052$لَيَصْرِمُنَّهَا|to pluck its fruit|126|216|17171$مُصْبِحِينَ|(in the) morning,|131|176|9817$

name: Word By Word
text: فَطَافَ|So there came|117|139|17173$عَلَيْهَا|upon it|69|113|1269$طَآئِفٌ|a visitation|93|137|7105$مِّن|from|50|94|53$رَّبِّكَ|your Lord,|87|131|1322$وَهُمْ|while they|88|110|256$نَآئِمُونَ|were asleep.|104|104|6633$

name: Word By Word
text: فَتَنَادَوْاْ|And they called one another|208|386|17176$مُصْبِحِينَ|(at) morning,|110|288|9817$

name: Word By Word
text: فَلَمَّا|But when|82|104|141$رَأَوْهَا|they saw it,|100|144|17186$قَالُوٓاْ|they said,|86|130|101$إِنَّا|`Indeed, we|102|146|120$لَضَآلُّونَ|(are) surely lost.|131|153|17187$

name: Word By Word
text: قَالَ|Said|52|71|309$أَوْسَطُهُمْ|(the) most moderate of them,|219|257|17188$أَلَمْ|`Did not|75|113|348$أَقُل|I tell|52|90|349$لَّكُمْ|you,|51|89|207$لَوْلَا|`Why not|84|103|1090$تُسَبِّحُونَ|you glorify (Allah)?``|160|160|17189$

name: Word By Word
text: فَأَقْبَلَ|Then approached,|140|164|14624$بَعْضُهُمْ|some of them|110|159|736$عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ|to others|128|177|17190$يَتَلَـٰوَمُونَ|blaming each other.|151|175|17191$

name: Word By Word
text: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|111|101$يَـٰوَيْلَنَآ|`O woe to us!|114|158|11736$إِنَّا|Indeed, we|94|138|120$كُنَّا|[we] were|88|132|4361$طَـٰغِينَ|transgressors.|114|136|14596$

name: Word By Word
text: كَذَٲلِكَ|Such|77|84|702$ٱلْعَذَابُ‌ۖ|(is) the punishment.|154|169|827$وَلَعَذَابُ|And surely the punishment|196|211|9480$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ|(of) the Hereafter|139|154|978$أَكْبَرُ‌ۚ|(is) greater,|100|107|1897$لَوْ|if|41|159|905$كَانُواْ|they|69|306|94$يَعْلَمُونَ|know.|92|210|115$

name: Word By Word
text: أَفَنَجْعَلُ|Then will We treat|142|214|17193$ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ|the Muslims|109|253|6229$كَٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ|like the criminals?|136|208|17194$

name: Word By Word
text: سَلْهُمْ|Ask them,|86|132|17196$أَيُّهُم|which of them|114|207|2859$بِذَٲلِكَ|for that|72|165|15476$زَعِيمٌ|(is) responsible.|125|171|9173$

name: Word By Word
text: يَوْمَ|(The) Day|87|102|1057$يُكْشَفُ|will be uncovered|135|166|17197$عَن|from|54|85|1105$سَاقٍ|the shin|73|104|17198$وَيُدْعَوْنَ|and they will be called|168|199|17199$إِلَى|to|53|68|118$ٱلسُّجُودِ|prostrate,|93|188|1151$فَلَا|but not|69|259|208$يَسْتَطِيعُونَ|they will be able,|133|228|2457$

name: Word By Word
text: فَذَرْنِى|So leave Me|101|137|17202$وَمَن|and whoever|105|176|1012$يُكَذِّبُ|denies|75|146|13290$بِهَـٰذَا|this|63|134|273$ٱلْحَدِيثِ‌ۖ|Statement,|95|131|10614$سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم|We will progressively lead them|227|251|7030$مِّنْ|from|50|98|53$حَيْثُ|where|68|116|371$لَا|not|42|90|30$يَعْلَمُونَ|they know.|94|118|115$

name: Word By Word
text: وَأُمْلِى|And I will give respite|162|189|7031$لَهُمْ‌ۚ|to them.|77|132|98$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|124|58$كَيْدِى|My plan|72|126|7032$مَتِينٌ|(is) firm.|76|103|7033$

name: Word By Word
text: فَٱصْبِرْ|So be patient|110|135|8535$لِحُكْمِ|for (the) decision|135|185|16237$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord,|117|167|1322$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|154|25$تَكُن|be|58|83|2943$كَصَاحِبِ|like (the) companion|155|183|17203$ٱلْحُوتِ|(of) the fish,|105|161|17204$إِذْ|when|55|111|1198$نَادَىٰ|he called out,|111|167|11069$وَهُوَ|while he|74|102|305$مَكْظُومٌ|(was) distressed.|135|135|17205$

name: Word By Word
text: لَّوْلَآ|If not|57|63|1090$أَن|that|48|60|655$تَدَٲرَكَهُۥ|overtook him|105|117|17206$نِعْمَةٌ|a Favor|70|82|12899$مِّن|from|50|62|53$رَّبِّهِۦ|his Lord,|76|88|392$لَنُبِذَ|surely he would have been thrown|248|254|17207$بِٱلْعَرَآءِ|onto (the) naked shore|174|252|14716$وَهُوَ|while he|74|230|305$مَذْمُومٌ|(was) blamed.|114|192|17208$

name: Word By Word
text: فَٱجْتَبَـٰهُ|But chose him,|118|143|17209$رَبُّهُۥ|his Lord,|76|127|1128$فَجَعَلَهُۥ|and made him|111|162|12814$مِنَ|of|50|101|156$ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ|the righteous.|117|142|1197$

name: Word By Word
text: وَإِن|And indeed,|98|105|213$يَكَادُ|would almost|106|120|170$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|103|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve,|89|103|59$لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ|surely make you slip|153|167|17210$بِأَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ|with their eyes|119|126|17211$لَمَّا|when|55|64|3471$سَمِعُواْ|they hear|84|101|5187$ٱلذِّكْرَ|the Message,|109|126|9717$وَيَقُولُونَ|and they say,|112|129|3019$إِنَّهُۥ|`Indeed, he|99|116|396$لَمَجْنُونٌ|(is) surely mad.`|131|140|9713$
